fact-2.value: In October 2021 Hybrid Software Group PLC changed its name from Global Graphics PLC to underline the Group’s position as a software company providing innovative technology for industrial print manufacturing at a time when industry is accelerating towards mass customisation, smart factories, and Industry 4.0.

fact-4.value: is a leading developer of software platforms on which our partners create solutions for digital printing, digital document and PDF applications. It is also a leading supplier of drive electronics for industrial inkjet printing.
